=== Current Position ===
(Left is decreasing x, Right is increasing x, Up is decreasing y, Down is increasing y)
(row = 7, col = 11)
=== Last Position ===
(row = 7, col = 11)

Given that the avatar's position has not changed since the last state, it indicates that a previous action may have involved rotation without movement. Therefore, we must reconsider the options available without changing positions.

Currently, the avatar is at (row = 7, col = 11), and the adjacent positions include a boulder (row 7, col 12) to the right and a wall (row = 7, col = 10) to the left. There’s also an enemy (a crab represented by '$') below the avatar at (row = 8, col = 1). Moving down, up, left, or right did not seem to yield a beneficial outcome yet.

Given the situation, the only productive action here would be to attempt to establish a movement by moving downward to engage with the resources/dirt (position (row 8, col 11)). 

Based on this strategy and available mechanics, I will choose to:
``` Action: 4 ```
This action aims to navigate downward into a space free from immediate threats and ensure movement occurs. My expectation is to find a more favorable landscape open for future resource collection or further positioning toward the exit.
